title: Ensnaring Strike
content:
can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Ensnaring Strike Information

Description: Your attack summons thorny vines that possibly Ensnare your target. Ensnared creatures take 1d6 Piercing at the start of each turn. The creature or an ally can use its action to try to tear away the vines. Level: Lvl 1 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: Weapon Duration: 10 turns Requires Concentration: Y
